Unbound Assault.name: Unbound Assault
Unbound Assault.fullText:
Bloodfury Savage Attack 11Unbound Assault

You tear across the battlefield, eager to feed fresh kills to your weapon.

Encounter        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength or Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Strength or Dexterity as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 20.
Unbound Assault.flavor: You tear across the battlefield, eager to feed fresh kills to your weapon.
Unbound Assault.effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.
Unbound Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
Unbound Assault.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength or Dexterity as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Frothing Madness.name: Frothing Madness
Frothing Madness.fullText:
Bloodfury Savage Utility 12Frothing Madness

Something erupts inside you, turning you into a relentless force of destruction.

Daily        Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls and a +5 bonus to saving throws.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 20.
Frothing Madness.flavor: Something erupts inside you, turning you into a relentless force of destruction.
Frothing Madness.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls and a +5 bonus to saving throws.

Murderous Rage.name: Murderous Rage
Murderous Rage.fullText:
Bloodfury Savage Attack 20Murderous Rage

You swear that your foe will not survive this battle, as you focus your steadily growing fury on it.

Daily        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength or Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against the target. Whenever you hit the target with a melee attack, this bonus increases by 1.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Strength or Dexterity as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 20.
Murderous Rage.flavor: You swear that your foe will not survive this battle, as you focus your steadily growing fury on it.
Murderous Rage.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against the target. Whenever you hit the target with a melee attack, this bonus increases by 1.
Murderous Rage.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength or Dexterity as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.
